title: Bank Loan Report Dashboard
description: End-to-end Power BI dashboard monitoring bank loan performance metrics including default rates, approval ratios, and borrower demographics with ETL pipelines and interactive visualizations.
highlights: Built comprehensive ETL pipeline for loan data processing
Implemented KPI tracking for loan performance metrics
Designed drill-through functionality for detailed analysis

title: Fault Tolerant Matrix Computation on Systolic Arrays
description: Designed fault-tolerant systolic array architecture with embedded error detection and correction techniques. Published and presented at IEEE ICCCNT 2025 (IIT Indore).
highlights: Integrated Hamming Code for error correction

title: OpenWISP Monitoring: Real-Time Network Health Insights
description: Built Python-Django based network health monitoring system with real-time ping/Iperf3/WiFi client checks, integrated with InfluxDB and Redis for performance tracking.
highlights: Integration with InfluxDB for time-series data

title: IoT-Based Smart Energy Meter for Energy Efficiency
description: Created smart energy meter using ESP32 and PIR sensor for live energy consumption tracking with occupancy-based control and cloud integration via Ubidots.
highlights: Mobile app dashboard for remote monitoring

title: Video-Based Emotion Detection Using Deep Learning
description: Developed CNN-based facial emotion recognition model using FER2013 dataset with real-time OpenCV integration for live video stream analysis.
highlights: Trained CNN model on FER2013 dataset
Detects 7 emotions: Happy, Sad, Angry, Surprise, Fear, Disgust, Neutral

title: Sales & Profit Dashboard
description: Developed interactive executive-level dashboard analyzing sales, profit, and customer performance with Power Query, PivotTables, and automated reporting.
highlights: Automated data refresh with Power Query
